Welcome.

If you want to connect your Dreambox to a network and/or the Internet, this wizard will guide you through the basic network setup of your Dreambox.

Press OK to start configuring your network
Your Dreambox is already connected to the Internet.\nThere is no configuration required.

Please select one or more network technologies that should be used to connect your Dreambox to a Network and/or the Internet.\n\nYou may want to plug in USB Networking devices now (if you want to use any).
Please select the network service(s) you want to connect your Dreambox to.\nIt may take a few moments before wireless networks show up in the list below!
Please configure at least on set of IP Addresses (IPv4 or IPv6).
Please configure at least one valid Nameserver (DNS).
Your Network connection is NOT set up!\nPlease go back to reconfigure or press OK to continue anyways.
